favourite.article: Yes Lord Jesus I love You. Keep us turning to You each day and every moment.
Lord we give You all the ground... Saturate us oh Lord.... Keep us turning to You always.... what a beautiful song.....
Lord I love You. Thank You for loving us. Truly You are my first love, my true love. Lord, continue to captive our heart only for You. Fill us with Your divine love. Amen. I love You, Lord.
Keep me turning to You every day. Until I'm expressing only You :-)

Amen! I found it. Lord Jesus I LOVE You. Without YOU LORD I am nothing. You are my life, You are my everything. Thank You So Much...
It's a simple and nice music. I really am touched by this kind of song. I love it!

What a wonderful tune to turn my heart to the Lord. It's a way to usher ourselves into our spirit. Oh Lord Jesus, I love You! Saturate my entire being that I may be Your reflection. Fill every corner, displace anything that is not according to Your purpose. Take my life!
Heartfelt. The words just flow off the tongue with such a melody. Good for daily consecration. I remember there being a 2nd verse in the corporate aspect too..
Praise the Lord I found this song. It is the greatest song about loving my Lord. Awesome!
